hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah said:"If a person becomes bankrupt, then a man finds the goods that he sold to him with him, he has more right to them than anyone else

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلِ يَبْتَاعُ الْبَيْعَ فَيُفْلِسُ وَيُوجَدُ الْمَتَاعُ بِعَيْنِهِ
chapter.eng-name: If A Man Buy A Product Then Becomes Bankrupt, And The Product Itself Is Found With Him
